chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Lstate: Type
nodes: dstatelet -> pred nid
coh: cohpred nodes
d: dstatelet

Goal:
d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)

Premises:
nid = nat : Set
cohpred = Coherence.cohpred : (dstatelet -> pred nid) -> Type Arguments cohpred _%function_scope
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [Lstate : Type nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid coh : cohpred nodes d : dstatelet |- Type] ?T' : [Lstate : Type nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid coh : cohpred nodes d : dstatelet |- Type] ?f : [Lstate : Type nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid coh : cohpred nodes d : dstatelet |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [Lstate : Type nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid coh : cohpred nodes d : dstatelet |- ?T'] ?s : [Lstate : Type nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid coh : cohpred nodes d : dstatelet |- seq ?T]
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> mixin_of nodes coh
Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> mixin_of nodes coh
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
Record cohpred (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) : Type := Pack { sort : dstatelet -> Prop; _ : mixin_of nodes sort } Arguments Coherence.cohpred _%function_scope Arguments Pack [nodes sort]%function_scope
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
sort : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, Coherence.cohpred nodes -> dstatelet -> Prop
CohPred : forall (T : dstatelet -> pred nid) (m : dstatelet -> Prop), mixin_of T m -> Coherence.cohpred T
Pack : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (sort : dstatelet -> Prop), mixin_of nodes sort -> Coherence.cohpred nodes
pack : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (T : dstatelet -> Prop), mixin_of nodes T -> Coherence.cohpred nodes
clone : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (T : dstatelet -> Prop) (cT : Coherence.cohpred nodes) (c : mixin_of nodes T), T = cT -> phant_id (pack c) cT -> Coherence.cohpred nodes
class : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (cT : Coherence.cohpred nodes), mixin_of nodes cT
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
*** [ UMDef.tp : ordType -> Type -> Type ] Arguments UMDef.tp _ _%type_scope
ssrbool.SimplPred = fun T : Type => [eta SimplFun (rT:=bool)] : forall T : Type, pred T -> simpl_pred T Arguments ssrbool.SimplPred {T}%type_scope
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
Image_mem : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (P : Pred A) (x : A), x \In P -> f x \In [Image f i | i <- P]
Simpl_Pred = simpl_fun^~ Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Simpl_Pred _%type_scope
validL : forall (U : pcm) (x y : U), valid (x \+ y) -> valid x
valid_mt_state = (fun _evar_0_ : true => eq_ind_r [eta is_true] _evar_0_ (valid_unit (union_mapPCM [ordType of nid] heap))) is_true_true : valid (dstate empty_dstatelet)
post_valid : forall s : soup, valid s -> forall m : msg TaggedMessage, valid (post_msg s m).1
consume_valid : forall (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (m : mid), valid s' -> valid (consume_msg s' m)
lstate_type = [eta union_map [ordType of nid]] : Type -> Type Arguments lstate_type _%type_scope
finMap_for : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), phant (K -> V) -> Type
pred_of_simpl : forall T : Type, simpl_pred T -> pred T
image_spec_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : SProp), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0
image_spec_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : Prop), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Im_mem : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (a : A), b = f a -> a \In P -> image_spec P f b
Pred_Sort : forall T : Type, PredType T -> Type
last_key_dom : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> last_key f \notin dom f -> f = Unit
dom_last_key : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> ~~ empb f -> last_key f \in dom f
Inductive base (K : ordType) (V : Type) (p : pred K) : Type := Undef : UM.base V p | Def : forall f : {finMap K -> V}, all p (supp f) -> UM.base V p Arguments UM.base [K] _%type_scope Arguments UM.Undef [K] _%type_scope Arguments UM.Def [K] [V]%type_scope [p f]
UM.Def : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (p : pred K) (f : {finMap K -> V}), all p (supp f) -> UM.base V p
union_mapPCM = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) => PCM.Pack (union_mapPCMMix K V) : ordType -> Type -> pcm Arguments union_mapPCM _ _%type_scope
UMC.p : forall (K : ordType) (V T : Type), UMC.class_of K V T -> pred K
UMC.sort : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V -> Type
UM.valid : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (p : pred K), UM.base V p -> bool

original: intros. intro H. unfold valid. auto.
